Intake Information

Client Name: John Smith
Date of Incident: January 15, 2024
Location: Dublin, Ireland

Description:
I was involved in a car accident on the M50 motorway near Blanchardstown. The other driver ran a red light and hit my vehicle on the driver's side. I sustained injuries to my neck and back, requiring medical treatment at Connolly Hospital.

The accident happened around 3:30 PM during heavy rain. I have photos of the damage and a police report (reference #2024-01-15-M50-3421).

Medical Treatment:
- Emergency room visit on January 15, 2024
- Follow-up appointments with physiotherapist (ongoing)
- MRI scan scheduled for February 2024

Witnesses:
- Mary O'Brien (passenger in my car): +353 86 123 4567
- Tom Murphy (pedestrian): +353 87 234 5678

Insurance:
My insurance company: AXA Ireland (Policy #IE-12345678)
Other driver's insurance: Aviva (Policy #AV-87654321)

Questions:
1. How long do I have to file a claim?
2. What compensation might I be entitled to?
3. Should I accept the insurance company's settlement offer?

Contact Information:
